title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & other LLMs locally on macOS, Linux & Windows with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list & delete models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM & chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, RAG, user auth) installable via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent DSL, async calls & Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST endpoints.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (terminal UI) for interactive chat & model management written in Rust.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector & autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub with multi-arch manifests.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting Ollama models act as generators in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that exposes Ollama models as slash commands with per-guild model settings.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin for AI-assisted note taking using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for text generation & summarization.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama API.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: Native SwiftUI menu-bar app for macOS to chat with Ollama models without terminal.
